CustomField.description: Used to associate filter criteria records with one another. (i.e. if 3 filter criteria records have the same filter number they all go together and make up a "price rule") Field Type: IA Integrated: N
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used to associate filter criteria records with one another. (i.e. if 3 filter criteria records have the same filter number they all go together and make up a "price rule")
CustomField.label: Filter Number
